statements: SELECT * FROM policy_renewal_reminders;
SELECT policyholder_name, renewal_date FROM policy_renewal_reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, policy_number FROM policy_renewal_reminders WHERE reminder_sent = 0;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewal_reminders ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_renewal_reminders WHERE policyholder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_renewal_reminders WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewal_reminders WHERE renewal_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT policyholder_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reminders FROM policy_renewal_reminders GROUP BY policyholder_name;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_renewal_reminders WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT policyholder_name FROM policy_renewal_reminders WHERE reminder_sent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE name = 'Alice'
SELECT id, email FROM policyholders WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE policy_number LIKE 'P%'
SELECT policyholder_id, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, name, email, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policyholders
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE policy_number = 'ABC123'
SELECT id, name, email FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reminder_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT policyholders.id, policyholders.name, reminders.reminder_date FROM policyholders JOIN reminders ON policyholders.id = reminders.policyholder_id
SELECT id, name, email, renewal_date FROM policyholders WHERE renewal_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT policy_number, coverage, start_date FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policyholder_id, email FROM policyholders WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_id, name, email FROM policyholders WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE coverage = 'Life Insurance';

SELECT policyholders.name, policies.policy_number, reminders.reminder_date FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.policyholder_id = policies.policyholder_id JOIN reminders ON policies.policy_id = reminders.policy_id;
SELECT policyholder_id, name, phone_number FROM policyholders WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY policyholder_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policyholder_id, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policyholders ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE sent = FALSE;
SELECT log_id, email_sent_date, email_subject FROM email_logs WHERE policyholder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01' AND policy_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT name, renewal_amount FROM policyholders JOIN renewal_history ON policyholders.policyholder_id = renewal_history.policyholder_id WHERE renewal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY name LIMIT 5;
SELECT policyholder_id, MAX(reminder_date) AS latest_reminder_date FROM reminders GROUP BY policyholder_id ORDER BY latest_reminder_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policyholder_id, email_sent_date, email_subject FROM email_logs WHERE email_sent_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY email_sent_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, email FROM Policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_id, email FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Policies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM Templates;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM Policies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT rp.* FROM Reminders rp JOIN Policies p ON rp.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE reminder_method = 'Email';
SELECT t.template_name, t.template_content, l.log_date FROM Templates t JOIN Logs l ON t.template_id = l.log_id;
